FuncDef: Use the display arp | command to display the ARP mapping entries related to string in a specified way. Related command: arp static , and reset arp .
CLIs: display arp [ [ dynamic | static ] | { begin | exclude | include } <text> ]

ParaDef.Info: { begin | exclude | include } text : Regular expression, where:
Displays the ARP mapping entries from the first ARP entry that contains the specified string given by the text argument.
Displays the ARP mapping entries that do not contain the specified string given by the text argument.
Displays the ARP mapping entries that contain the specified string given by the text argument.
String used to filter ARP mapping entries.

Examples: IP Address MAC Address VLAN ID Port Name / AL ID Aging Type
IP Address MAC Address VLAN ID Port Name / AL ID Aging Type
msg: Error CLI:display arp [ dynamic | static ] | { begin | exclude | include } <text>
